description: Mia Gold may not have known exactly what she was signing up for when she agreed to do our 2 hour long Electrosluts LIVE shoot where we don't take one break or stop for one minute! If you missed this white hot, shocking, all action live show from the begining of the month here is your chance to watch it and experience the high intensity Electro Lezdom Action! Watch this fresh young thing experience a tazer, the cattle prod, electro double penetration, WRIST deep Pussy and ANAL fisting and SO MUCH MORE! Mistress Lea Lexis has complete control of this budding Electrosluts that Mia agrees to take more cattle prod shocks than anyone EVER on Electrosluts!!
title: Lea Lexis Pushes Mia Golds Electro-Limits LIVE!
